JPO application documentation

Package jpo

Interface Summary
AdvanceTimerInterface This interface defines what methods the implementing object must have if it wants be the receiver of AdvanceTimer events.
ApplicationMenuInterface This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create an ApplicationJMenuBar.
ChangeWindowInterface This interface defines the methods that an object must implement if it wants to be able to receive requests from a ChangeWindowPopupMenu.
CleverJTreeInterface This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create a CleverJTree.
CopyLocationsChangeListener Interface to notify that the Settings.copyLocations array has changed.
GroupPopupInterface This interface defines the method that an object must implement if it wants to create a GroupPopupMenu
PictureInfoChangeListener This interface allows PictureInfo objects to tell other objects about changes
RecentDropNodeListener This interface allows the Settings object to notify any interested object that the array Settings.recentDropNodes has changed.
RecentOpenFileListener This interface allows the Settings to inform an object that the recently opened files array has changed.
ScalablePictureListener This interface allows an object to inform another object that the status it is listening on has changed.
SourcePictureListener This interface allows an object to inform another object that the status it is listening on has changed.
UserFunctionsChangeListener Interface to notify that the Settings.copyLocations array has changed.
 

Class Summary
AddFromCamera This class creates a JFrame and then presents the user with the dialog to add pictures directly from the camera.
AdvanceTimer This class implements a Thread waits a period of time and then calls the method requestAdvance on it's calling object.
ApplicationJMenuBar This class builds the main menu of the Jpo application.
Camera A class which holds information about the digital camera as seen by the filesystem
CameraEditor This class creates a JFrame and then presents the user with the dialog to add pictures directly from the camera.
ChangeWindowPopupMenu A class that generates a popup menu for a group node.
CleverJTree The is one of the main classes in the JPO application as it is an extended JTree that deals with most of the logic surrounding the collection and the user interactions with it.
CollectionDistillerJFrame class that generates a GUI for the export of a collection
CollectionPropertiesJFrame class that presents a GUI and shows the user which files are in his collection and which are not.
CollectionPropertiesJPanel class that presents a GUI and shows the user which files are in his collection and which are not.
ConsolidateGroupJFrame Creates a GUI that allows the user to specify into which directory he or she would like images to be moved physically.
ConsolidateGroupThread a class that moves all pictures of a group to a target directory
DirectoryChooser An object of this class displays a text field with a dropdown button to select the previously used directories and has a button next to it which allows you to bring up a filechooser.
ExcelAdapter ExcelAdapter enables Copy-Paste Clipboard functionality on JTables.
ExifViewerJFrame GUI to display the Exif tags extracted with Drew's programs
ExifViewerJScrollPane GUI to display the Exif tags extracted with Drew's programs
FlatFileDistillerThread a class that exports a tree of chapters to an XML file
FrameShower As per http://java.sun.com/developer/JDCTechTips/2003/tt1208.html#1 Multithreading in Swing Tech Tip
GroupInfo A class which holds information about the group and has been given the intelligence of how to write itself and it's pictures to an html document.
GroupInfoEditor class that creates a Frame and allows the field(s) of a group to be edited.
GroupPopupMenu A class that generates a popup menu for a group node.
HtmlDistillerJFrame A GUI for the HtmlDistiller.
HtmlDistillerThread This thread object generates a web of html pages that allows you to browse groups of pictures using a web browsers.
ImageFilter This class overrides the abstract javax.swing.filechoose.FileFilter class (not the java.io.FileFilter) to provide a true or false indicator to using JFileChoosers whether the file is a directory or image ending in .jpg, .jpeg, .tif, .tiff or .gif.
InfoPanel The infopanel shows interesting stuff about what has been selected.
IntegrityChecker IntegrityChecker.java: creates a frame and checks the integrity of the collection
JarDistillerJFrame Deprecated. This is not peoperly thought through and should not be used.
JarDistillerThread a class that exports a tree of chapters to an XML file
JarFilter This class overrides the abstract javax.swing.filechoose.FileFilter class (not the java.io.FileFilter) to provide a true or false indicator to using JFileChoosers whether the file is a directory or image ending in .jar.
JpgFilter This class overrides the abstract javax.swing.filechoose.FileFilter class (not the java.io.FileFilter) to provide a true or false indicator to using JFileChoosers whether the file is a directory or image ending in .jpg or .jpeg.
Jpo Jpo is the the main class of a browser application that lets a user view a collection of pictures in as thumbnails, in a seperate window or in a full sized mode.
JpoResources class that holds the generic labels for the JPO application.
JpoResources_fr class that holds the translated french labels for the JPO application
JpoTransferable  
LoadThread a class that moves all pictures of a group to a target directory
NonFocussedCaret This class overrides the adjustVisibility method of the DefaultCaret class.
PictureAdder Brings up a Filechooser and then loads the selected pictures into the collection.
PictureCache class that manages the cache of pictures
PictureCacheLoader This is a class that is non static that can load imaged to the cache
PictureInfo Objects of this type represent a single picture in the collection.
PictureInfoChangeEvent Objects of this class have details about what was changed in a PictureInfo object.
PictureInfoEditor class that creates a JFrame and displays the fields of a picture.
PicturePane The job of this extended JComponent is to load, scale and display a picture while providing mouse control over which area is being shown and at which magnification.
PicturePopupMenu This class generates a popup menu over a picture node.
PictureViewer PictureViewer manages a window which diplays a picture.
ProgressGui a private class that allows the PictureAdder to show what it is doing.
Query This class stores the parameters for a search and can return an Arraylist of the search results.
QueryJFrame QueryJFrame.java: creates a GUI to allow the user to specify his search
ReconcileJFrame This class creates a JFrame where the user can specify a directory against which he wants to reconcile the current collection.
ScalablePicture a class to load and scale an image either immediately or in a seperate thread.
ScaleThread a thread object that calls the ScalablePicture scalePicture method
Settings This class defines all the settings for the JPO application.
SettingsDialog GUI that allos the settings to be changed.
SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode This class extends the DefaultMutableTreeNode with the Comparable Interface that allows our nodes to be compared.
SourcePicture a class to load and scale a picture either immediately or in a seperate thread from a URL
TableJFrame  
TableMap  
TableSorter  
Thumbnail Thumbnail displays a visual representation of the specified node.
ThumbnailCreationQueue Queue that holds requests to create Thumbnails from Highres Images
ThumbnailCreationThread Queue that holds requests to create Thumbnails from Highres Images
ThumbnailDescriptionJPanel ThumbnailDescriptionJPanel is a JPanel that displays the metadata of a thumbnail.
ThumbnailJScrollPane The ThumbnailJScrollPane manages a JPanel in a JScrollPane that displays a group of pictures in a grid of thumbnails or ad hoc search results..
ThumbnailQueueRequest Object that holds the references to the Thumbnail and the priority with which the request was submitted
Tools sepearate class to hold a collection of static methods that are frequently needed.
WholeNumberField a clever JTextField that allows only numbers to be captured
XmlDistiller a class that exports a tree of chapters to an XML file
XmlFilter This class overrides the abstract javax.swing.filechoose.FileFilter class (not the java.io.FileFilter) to provide a true or false indicator to using JFileChoosers whether the file is a directory or image ending in .xml.
XmlReader class that reads an XML collection and creates a tree of SortableDefaultMutableTreeNodes
XmlReaderThread This class was invented to spawn a new thread and to the Xml parsing there.
